credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions:

With Frame H x W: 35.4 x 41.3 cm (14 1/8 x 16 1/4 in.)

title: Scenic Plaque
provenance:
Jordan-Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman

Marcia and William Goodman
description:
Rectangular plaque set into a plain oak frame.
Cast, white stoneware plaque decorated with misty tropical scene with a tree covered with hanging moss in foreground and palm trees along the banks of a still river; more palm trees and foliage in background. Predominately in shades of greens, blues and blue-grays. Vellum glaze on front and partially on sides; cracklature. Back not glazed.
name: Plaque
